data.message: Thanks Facebook for creating , the convenient, useful website that allows, helps people around the world to connect, contact to others, friends, families just only take  a few minutes for others to receive a message. Excellent FB!!!!

replies.message: We appreciate the kind words, Lily! Thank you for being a part of our Facebook community, we're happy we could help you stay connected. :) -Rose
Because of you I'm staying connected with all my friends and family around World.👍thank you Facebook keep doing great job !

hi facebook. why my updated status doesn't showed to public as before? why there's no "public" button in my option when i want to post a status? please..i want to have a "public" button again. so that when i want to post a status..i want to show to public

Facebook is there a way to get in touch with someone, as in a real person not a form or inquiry, as to why some content is removed even though it does not violate the terms of service but other content that clearly violates terms of service is not removed???
Hi Facebook! We want to Change our Facebook Page Name but page likes is upto 200. So, please tell us how to change our Facebook page name?

Hi WIKIX Graphicx. If 200 or more people like your Page, you must be an admin to submit a request to change your Page's name. If your request is approved, you won't be able to change your Page's name again. You can only change your Page's name once. To submit a request, follow these 5 easy steps from our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/271607792873806?sr=1&query=how%20to%20change%20page%20name&sid=0GDU3aU2kgQOvhXzP. Hope this helps! -Sarah
